resources.string:
Hello and welcome to my resume! This application contains various examples of commonly used Android design.

For example, this element is a custom font view that is set via xml. Additionally, it is a text view with some basic HTML formatting.

Swipe from the left edge or tap the app title to see more.
This is your basic menu drawer found in most Android apps.

string-array.name: material_content_array
string-array.item: This is an example of one of the newer Android design paradigms, material design.
As a whole material design has taken a much flatter color palette.
However, as you can see with these list cards, the items have depth.
This is achieved by rounding the edges and giving the item a shadow.
